title: Person of Interest - Want to talk about it ? (04x17)
author: POI - Best Of
comment:
Love how the soundtrack of the first scene between John and Jessica played when he said " There was a woman once .. " 
Reese's eyes speak volumes when he mentioned her .. 
So beautiful yet so sad and painful
MY FAVORITE SHOW!  Was sad when they canceled it.  PS, Iris is hot!
Jim cavizel one of my top 5 actors
where do you find these clips?? and how do you make it good quality
